title: Samsung Galaxy S22 Ultra Review: A phenomenal 5-star smartphone
content:
The Galaxy S22 Ultra is absolutely fabulous, bringing the very best of Samsung in all areas of the phone experience. Here's our review of the Snapdragon-powered version.

The post Samsung Galaxy S22 Ultra Review: A phenomenal 5-star smartphone appeared first on xda-developers.
